results.title: The importance of presynaptic beta receptors in Raynaud's disease.
results.text_hl: The association of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ with @CHEMICAL_Flunarizine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005444 @@@flunarizine@@@ caused an 80% reduction in the number of @DISEASE_Status_Asthmaticus @DISEASE_MESH:D013224 @@@vasospastic crises@@@, a significant increase (p less than 0.001) in the photoplethysmographic wave amplitude, and complete disappearance of @<m>DISEASE_Paresthesia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010292 @@@pain and paresthesia@@@.

citations.NLM: Brotzu G, Falchi S, Mannu B, Montisci R, Petruzzo P, Staico R. The importance of presynaptic beta receptors in Raynaud's disease. J Vasc Surg. 1989 Jun;9(6):767-71. PMID: 2542629
